verses.kjv: Behold, how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity!
verses.ct: Look at how wonderful and delightful it is when brothers and sisters live together in harmony!

verses.kjv: It is like the precious ointment upon the head, that ran down upon the beard, even Aaron’s beard: that went down to the skirts of his garments;
verses.ct: It's like expensive oil poured over the head, flowing down onto the beard — Aaron's beard — dripping all the way down to the collar of his robes.

verses.kjv: As the dew of Hermon, and as the dew that descended upon the mountains of Zion: for there the LORD commanded the blessing, even life for evermore.
verses.ct: It's like the dew of Hermon falling on the mountains of Zion. For that is where the LORD has declared his blessing — life that lasts forever.
